faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to your most common questions.

shipping.question: What are the shipping options?
shipping.answer: We offer free standard shipping (3-5 business days) on all orders. Express shipping (1-2 business days) is available for an additional fee.

returns.question: How can I return an item?
returns.answer: You can return any item free of charge within 30 days of receipt. Please visit our returns portal to start the process.

sizing.question: How do I find my right size?
sizing.answer: Each product page includes a detailed size guide with specific measurements. If you are unsure, do not hesitate to contact our customer service for a personal consultation.

care.question: How do I care for my items?
care.answer: Care instructions are available on the label of each item and in the 'Details & Care' section on the product page. For delicate materials like cashmere or silk, we recommend professional dry cleaning.

contact.question: How can I contact you?
contact.answer: Our customer service team is available by email at service@ezentials.com or through our contact form. We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to EZENTIALS. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website.

data_collected.title: Data We Collect About You
data_collected.content: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together as follows: Identity Data, Contact Data, Financial Data, Transaction Data, Technical Data, Profile Data, and Usage Data.

data_usage.title: How We Use Your Personal Data
data_usage.content: We will only use your personal data to provide and improve our services, process your orders, manage your account, personalize your experience on our site, and to communicate with you.

data_sharing.title: Data Sharing
data_sharing.content: We may share your personal data with third parties for specific purposes, such as payment processors and delivery partners. We do not share your data with third parties for marketing purposes without your express consent.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to distinguish you from other users of our website. This helps us to provide you with a good experience when you browse our website and also allows us to improve our site.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorised way, altered or disclosed.

user_rights.title: Your Legal Rights
user_rights.content: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including the right to access, correct, erase, restrict processing, object to processing, and data portability.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at privacy@ezentials.com.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms then you may not access the Service.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide us with information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account on our Service.

products.title: Products
products.content: We have made every effort to display as accurately as possible the colors and images of our products that appear at the store. We cannot guarantee that your computer monitor's display of any color will be accurate. All descriptions of products or product pricing are subject to change at any time without notice, at our sole discretion.

payments.title: Payments
payments.content: We reserve the right to refuse any order you place with us. We may, in our sole discretion, limit or cancel quantities purchased per person, per household or per order. In the event that we make a change to or cancel an order, we may attempt to notify you by contacting the e-mail and/or billing address/phone number provided at the time the order was made.

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: The Service and its original content, features and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of EZENTIALS and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both the Country and foreign countries.

limitation_of_liability.title: Limitation Of Liability
limitation_of_liability.content: In no event shall EZENTIALS, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

governing_law.title: Governing Law
governing_law.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the Country, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@ezentials.com.

monarque_blazer.name: Virgin Wool Double-Breasted Blazer 'Monarque'
monarque_blazer.description: A double-breasted blazer of rare elegance, cut from a sumptuous 560g Italian virgin wool. Its slim fit and silk lining offer an impeccable silhouette and absolute comfort.
monarque_blazer.details: 560g Italian virgin wool, silk lining. Slim fit. Dry clean only.

aquila_suit.name: 3-Piece Cashmere Suit 'Aquila'
aquila_suit.description: The epitome of luxury. This three-piece suit is crafted from a 100% blended cashmere fabric, with seams entirely hand-finished for a couture finish.
aquila_suit.details: 100% blended cashmere fabric. Jacket, vest, and trousers included. Hand-stitched seams.

pur_shirt.name: Egyptian Cotton Oxford Shirt 'Pur'
pur_shirt.description: The essential of the men's wardrobe, reinvented. This shirt in incomparably soft Egyptian cotton is enhanced by a Milanese collar and genuine mother-of-pearl buttons.
pur_shirt.details: 100% Egyptian cotton. Milanese collar. Mother-of-pearl buttons. Slim fit.

nord_coat.name: Long Cashmere Blend Coat 'Nord'
nord_coat.description: Face the cold with sovereign elegance. This long, straight-cut coat in a cashmere blend has light insulation and a brushed finish for exquisite softness.
nord_coat.details: Cashmere and wool blend. Straight cut. Light insulation, brushed finish.

elegance_dress.name: Long Silk Dress 'Élégance'
elegance_dress.description: A centerpiece of any wardrobe. This long dress in pure silk features a fluid cut and an exclusive print, designed to float gracefully with every movement.
elegance_dress.details: 100% silk. Fluid cut. Exclusive print. Dry clean.

madame_suit.name: Wool Skirt Suit 'Madame'
madame_suit.description: Embody power and femininity. This suit consists of a fitted jacket and a pencil skirt, cut from a fine wool for an impeccable silhouette from morning to night.
madame_suit.details: Fine wool. Fitted jacket and pencil skirt. Fully lined.

rosee_blouse.name: French Lace Blouse 'Rosée'
rosee_blouse.description: Pure romance. This delicate blouse is made of French lace and adorned with hand-embroidered details, for a touch of unparalleled preciousness.
rosee_blouse.details: Authentic French lace. Hand-embroidered details. Silk top included.

velours_coat.name: Double-Faced Cashmere Coat 'Velours'
velours_coat.description: A cocoon of softness and luxury. This double-faced cashmere coat is incomparably light and warm, with a piped finish for discreet elegance.
velours_coat.details: 100% double-faced cashmere. Unlined for lightness. Hand-finished.

sculpt_dress.name: Crêpe Midi Dress 'Sculpt'
sculpt_dress.description: A dress of timeless elegance. Its empire cut and heavy crêpe fabric flatter the figure, while its invisible zip ensures a perfect finish.
sculpt_dress.details: High-quality crêpe. Empire cut. Midi length. Invisible zip.

forge_jeans.name: Raw Selvedge Jeans 'Forge'
forge_jeans.description: A jean for connoisseurs. Made from 14oz Japanese selvedge denim, it's designed to last and patina beautifully over time. Copper rivets.
forge_jeans.details: 14oz Japanese selvedge denim. Copper rivets. Raw, unwashed.

ezential_bag.name: Grained Leather Shoulder Bag 'Ézential'
ezential_bag.description: The ideal everyday companion. This spacious grained leather bag features a microfiber lining and multiple pockets for flawless organization.
ezential_bag.details: Grained calfskin leather. Microfiber lining. Interior zippered pocket and two patch pockets.

eclipse_heels.name: Patent Leather Pumps 9cm Heel 'Éclipse'
eclipse_heels.description: A slender silhouette and an assertive style. These black patent leather pumps feature a perfectly balanced 9 cm heel for surprising comfort.
eclipse_heels.details: Patent calfskin leather. 9 cm heel. Leather lining and insole.

souverain_oxfords.name: Hand-stitched Patinated Leather Oxfords 'Souverain'
souverain_oxfords.description: A masterpiece of shoemaking. Goodyear-welted and hand-patinated, each 'Souverain' oxford is unique.
